title: Solid acid catalyzed esterification of dicyclopentadiene with organic acids to bio-based functional monomers
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01019H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sang-Ho Chung, Marilena Demetriou, Hongqi Wang, N. Raveendran Shiju
Here, we report the synthesis of new functional monomers of dicyclopentadiene (DCPD) by esterification with carboxylic acids that can be derived from biomass.
